attributes.action: Stop  illegal immigrants coming to the UK , remove all illegal immigrants.
attributes.additional_details: We hear every day in the media of illegal immigrants making a dangerous journey across the channel in an attempt to claim asylum in the UK putting their lives and others at risk its time for this to stop. we know that this puts a huge strain on many services that have to be used   to help these illegal asylum seekers at a cost to the tax payer. we fear that some of these illegal immigrants may be terrorists coming to the UK hell bent on killing UK citizens the government must protect UK citizens
attributes.background: we ask parliament and the government to take whatever action is required  to stop illegal immigrants coming to the UK across the  English channel.we also ask that all illegal immigrants and asylum seekers  that are not entitled to reside in the UK be removed to their country of origin.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about people entering the UK through illegal means, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government to do to prevent this.

It's also not clear if you want asylum seekers to be removed if they haven't already made a successful asylum claim, or if and when their claim for asylum is refused.

We cannot publish petitions that contain false or unproven statements. This includes unsubstantiated claims that people attempting to enter the UK by illegal means may be terrorists.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
